extendedInfo.description: Enjoy taking notes on cute Memo pages and with varied emoticons!Sanrio Memo can help you organize your memos easily with customizable categories. What is more, it provides up to 30 emoticons for you to select as memo icon. More emoticons will be added with free updates.***Key features:- Memo categories can be newly created or modified. - View the memos by category, such as Work, Study, Life, etc.- 30 memo icons to use for emotion, including Bad Badtz-maru, Cinnamoroll and Hello Kitty. - 4 different themes are available for selection, Hello Kitty, Bad Badtz-maru, My Melody and KEROKERO KEROPPI.- Send email with the memo content.- Both English and Chinese available.

reviews.title: That important document
reviews.comment: ;-; last night, I stayed up late writing something that had a powerful meaning but every time when I try to open it.... FAIL.
reviews.author: Karen Quang

reviews.title: Okeey
reviews.comment: It does not rotate when I slide the keyboard, maybe a lil update for that would help a lot, but for a free app, I can pass it by. Its an ok memo and still, cute than many, great job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I USED TO LOVE
reviews.comment: Its been over 2 months now and you still haven\'t fixed the bug. Even after so many complaints about it.   now it force closes every time I click it ever since it updated the week of March 28th. Lost over 20 memos. Pisssssssed

reviews.title: Application likes to force close
reviews.comment: i have an unimportant memo, and i am planning to delete it. suddenly the application close. i will give 4 star if you repair it. The memo is simple, so i just could give you 4 star for it. upgrade it to a more lovely memo to give you 5 star. thanks for understanding.
